content:
(Jose Rizal)
I stand here today, on the brink of death
But my spirit remains unbroken, with my final breath
I stand for my country, for freedom and rights
I will not back down, even in the face of this fight

(Priest)
Dear Jose, your time on earth is through
But your spirit will live on, forever true
May the Lord have mercy on your soul
Rest in peace, may your story be told

(Commander of the execution squad)
Time to pay the price for your crimes
You leave behind a legacy of love and pride
But the law must be upheld, justice must be served
It is with a heavy heart that I give the word

(Doctor)
Jose Rizal, your time has come
But your memory will live on, forever young
You will be remembered as a hero and a martyr
Your sacrifice will not be in vain, for it will spur

(Crowd of Filipinos)
We stand here today, to witness your fate
But your legacy will live on, it is not too late
You fought for what you believed in, with all your might
You will always be remembered, a shining light

(Jose Rizal)
As I take my final breath, I am at peace
For I know that my fight was not in vain, but a release
My spirit will live on, forever free
And my country will one day be, what it was meant to be
